folder: Tompkins Avenue & Clifton Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
Tompkins Avenue, east side, north from Clifton Avenue. In the left background is St. Josephs Roman Catholic Church, at the N. E. corner of St. Mary's
Avenue.
January 18, 1931
P. L. Sperr
(2)
A detail view of the N. E. corner of Tompkins and Clifton Avenues, showing the Lvric Theatre, a
movie house.
January 18, 1931
P. L. Sperr
